import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import {testimonialsData} from "../../data/testimonialsData" import rightArrow from "../../assets/rightArrow.png" import leftArrow from "../../assets/leftArrow.png" function Testimonials() { const [selected,setSelected]=useState(0) console.log(testimonialsData) return (
TESTIMONIALS
What They Say About Us
{testimonialsData[selected].review}
{testimonialsData[selected].name} {testimonialsData[selected].status}
) } export default Testimonials
